scripts.start: lsof -i:8080 | grep node | awk '{ print "kill -9 " $2}' | sh | webpack --mode development --env development | webpack-dev-server --open --hot --progress --disableHostCheck --port 8080
scripts.pro: lsof -i:8080 | grep node | awk '{ print "kill -9 " $2}' | sh | webpack --mode production --env production | webpack-dev-server --open --hot --progress --disableHostCheck --port 8080
